summary: Website for a Practicing Chartered Accountant in India
architectural_notes: Firm details: B R Bhandari & Co, ICAI Reg: 101163W, 30+ years experience
Contact: Shop 2, Khodiyar Krupa Building, Carter Road-1, Borivali East, Mumbai-400066; Phone: 7738993300; Email: brbhandariandco@gmail.com; Hours: 10:30 AM-7:30 PM (Mon-Sat)
Partner 1: Uttamchand Bhandari, Partner, CA, 30+ years, specializes in Income Tax, Audit & Assurance
Partner 2: Padamraj Bhandari, Partner, CA, 30+ years, specializes in Income Tax, Audit & Assurance
Partner 3: Maheshchand Gupta, Partner, CA, 30+ years, specializes in Income Tax, Audit & Assurance, Finance Market & Capital Restructuring
Partner 4: Pooam Punamiya, Partner, CA, 20+ years, specializes in Income Tax, Audit & Assurance
Partner 5: Vinay Shah, Partner, CA, 10+ years, specializes in Income Tax, GST, Audit & Assurance, Finance Market & Capital Restructuring, Bank Audit
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Government/regulatory website icon set including icons for Income Tax, ROC, MCA, SEBI, GST, Professional Tax, RERA, and stock market symbols in a consistent style (govt-icons-set.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a professional homepage with hero section introducing the chartered accountant practice, including firm name, tagline, and a call-to-action button for consultation
Create an About section describing the chartered accountant's qualifications, experience, and professional memberships (ICAI registration)

Create a Services section listing core CA services including Audit & Assurance, Tax Compliance & Planning (Income Tax, GST), Accounting & Bookkeeping, Company Formation & Compliance, and Financial Consulting
Create a Contact section with a contact form that collects name, email, phone number, and message, storing submissions in the backend
Display office contact information including address, phone number, email, and business hours in the Contact section
Create a navigation menu with smooth scrolling to sections: Home, About, Services, and Contact

Apply a professional, trustworthy design theme appropriate for a chartered accountancy practice, using a sophisticated color palette with clean typography and a formal yet approachable layout that conveys expertise and reliability
Render generated professional images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated, including a professional office hero background and CA services icons

Create a Notifications section that displays government circulars and notifications from Indian regulatory bodies including Income Tax Department, Finance Bill updates, Budget announcements, Goods and Service Tax (GST) notifications, Custom department circulars, SEEPZ-SEZ updates, SEBI announcements, and Indian Finance Market notifications
Create a Tax Calculators section with interactive calculators including Income Tax calculator, GST calculator, and other relevant tax computation tools for Indian tax regulations
Create a Loan Calculators section with interactive calculators for computing loan EMIs, interest amounts, and repayment schedules
Create a Partners section displaying detailed information for 5 partners of the chartered accountancy practice
Render generated professional images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated, including partner profile photos and calculator/notification section visuals
Update the Hero section to display firm name 'B R Bhandari & Co' and tagline 'Ya Aeshu Suptaeshu Jagruti'
Update the About section to display ICAI registration number '101163W' and '30+ years of experience'

Update the Contact section to display the actual office address: 'Shop no 2, Ground floor, Khodiyar Krupa Building, Carter Road no-1, Next to Abhilasha Apartment, Borivali East, Mumbai, Maharashtra-400066'
Update the Contact section to display phone number '7738993300', email 'brbhandariandco@gmail.com', and business hours '10.30 AM to 7.30 PM (Monday to Saturday)'
Add clickable Google Maps link to the office address using the provided location URL: https://www.google.com/maps/place/B+R+BHANDARI+%26+CO+(CHARTERED+ACCOUNTANTS)/@19.2254424,72.854304,17z
Update Footer component to display 'B R Bhandari & Co' as the firm name and 'Ya Aeshu Suptaeshu Jagruti' as the tagline

Update the color scheme from the current navy blue and gold palette to a warmer, more sophisticated palette using emerald green as the primary color, warm amber/gold as the accent color, and deep charcoal for text, maintaining professional appeal suitable for a chartered accountancy practice

Enhance the About section with additional content including a detailed firm history paragraph explaining the firm's establishment and growth over 30+ years, a mission statement emphasizing integrity and client-focused service, and a vision statement about being a leading CA practice in Mumbai

Expand the Services section with more detailed descriptions for each service category, including specific deliverables, typical timelines, and key benefits for clients, while maintaining the existing service categories (Audit & Assurance, Tax Compliance & Planning, Accounting & Bookkeeping, Company Formation & Compliance, Financial Consulting)

Add a detailed Why Choose Us section before the Contact section that highlights 5-6 unique value propositions such as personalized attention, regulatory expertise, technology integration, transparent pricing, timely delivery, and comprehensive support

Enhance the Hero section background with a subtle animated gradient overlay effect that transitions smoothly between complementary shades of the new color palette, maintaining readability of the text content

Create a Government Resources section component that displays a grid of quick access links to official government and regulatory websites including Income Tax Department, ROC (Registrar of Companies), MCA (Ministry of Corporate Affairs), SEBI, GST Portal, Professional Tax, MahaGST, RERA (Real Estate Regulatory Authority), and share market portals (NSE/BSE), with each link showing an icon, website name, and opening in a new tab
Integrate the Government Resources section into the main App.tsx layout, positioning it after the Notifications section and before the Tax Calculators section

new_feature_requests.summary: Create website for Practicing Chartered Accountant in India
Implement a backend system to store and retrieve contact form submissions with fields for name, email, phone, message, and timestamp
Add Notifications section displaying government circulars for Income Tax, Finance Bill, Budget, GST, Custom department, SEEPZ-SEZ, SEBI, and Indian Finance Market
Add Tax Calculators and Loan Calculators tools section
Add Partner Details section displaying information for 5 partners
Add client testimonials section to display feedback from clients
Update backend partner data to include Uttamchand Bhandari (Partner, CA, 30+ years, specializing in Income Tax, Audit & Assurance)
Update backend partner data to include Padamraj Bhandari (Partner, CA, 30+ years, specializing in Income Tax, Audit & Assurance)
Update backend partner data to include Maheshchand Gupta (Partner, CA, 30+ years, specializing in Income Tax, Audit & Assurance, Finance Market & Capital Restructuring)
Update backend partner data to include Pooam Punamiya (Partner, CA, 20+ years, specializing in Income Tax, Audit & Assurance)
Update backend partner data to include Vinay Shah (Partner, CA, 10+ years, specializing in Income Tax, Goods and Service Tax, Audit & Assurance, Finance Market & Capital Restructuring, Bank Audit)
Adjust the design theme and color scheme of the website
Add more detailed content to existing sections
Add government resources section with links to official websites including Income Tax Department, ROC, MCA, SEBI, GST, Professional Tax, MahaGST, RERA, and share market portals
